A Case for Privileging Higher Stages over Deeper States (Documentary Presentation: Nazis, The Occult Conspiracy)

Recent history has given us an extreme example of ethnocentricism, where the National Socialist German Workers' Party (Nazis) believed that the blood in their veins made them descendants of gods, therefore justifying their quest to purge all other bloodlines. Yet, many people are not aware that the Nazis also participated in practices that induced various states of consciousness to uphold this ethnocentric perspective. Ken Wilber attributes this collective madness to the notion that 1940's Germany was "rationality hijacked by tribalism, by an ethnocentric mythology of blood and soil and race, rooted in the land, romantic in its dispositions, barbaric in its ethnic cleaning… These are not rational desires by any definition of rational; these are ethnocentric tribalism commandeering the tools of an advanced consciousness and using them precisely for the lowest of the lowest motives" (Wilber, Integral Psychology).

In this meetup, we will discuss the need for vertical stage perspectives with horizontal states of consciousness. To foster a discussion around this theme, we will watch the highly acclaimed documentary by the Discovery Channel, "Nazis: The Occult Conspiracy". (Please note: Due to the length of this documentary, we will only watch the second half. Although not necessary to attend this meetup, you can watch the first half here: http://video.google.c...)

“I highly recommend that you get a copy of the Discovery Channel documentary video Nazis: The Occult Conspiracy. Hitler and his inner circle… were deeply into the practice of mysticism and mystical states of consciousness” (Wilber, Integral Spirituality).


(This meetup has been moved to the second Thursday in May due to a schedule conflict.)

Love,
Ted & Nic
